entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
